ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: a esfera pequena na frente do quadrado e do triangulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: the small sphere in front of the square and the triangle
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-ball size-small in-front-of-y landmark-type-cube landmark-in-front-of-a second-landmark-type-cone

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: quadrado na ferente do triangulo e da esfera respectivamente
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: square in front of the triangle and the sphere respectively

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: triangulo, quadrado vermelho, circulo, nessa ordem
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: triangle, red square and circle, in that order
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-cone near-w landmark-type-cube landmark-colour-red landmark-near-v second-landmark-type-ball

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: triangulo, com um quadrado atras dele, e um circulo atras do quadrado
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: triangle, with a square behind it, and a circle behind the square

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: quadrado vermelho, na frente do circulo, e o circulo a frente do triangulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: red square, in front of the circle, and the circle in front of the triangle
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-cube colour-red in-front-of-u landmark-type-ball landmark-in-front-of-i second-landmark-type-cone

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: triangulo na frente do quadrado vermelho, que esta na frente do circulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: triangle in front of the red square, which is in front of the circle
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-cone in-front-of-w landmark-type-cube landmark-colour-red landmark-in-front-of-v second-landmark-type-ball

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: o circulo do lado direito do quadrado que ta do lado direito do triangulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: the circle on the right side of the square that is on the right side of the triangle

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: para o quadrado na frente do circulo, que esta na frente do triangulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: to the square in front of the circle, which is in front of the triangle

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: apontando para o quadrado que esta na frente de duas esferas, essas esferas estao uma em cima da outra
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: pointing to the square that is in front of two spheres, these spheres are on top of each other

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: triangulo a direita do quadrado, e o quadrado tem á sua esquerda um circulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: triangle on the right side of the square, and the square has on its left side a circle

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: para o circulo em baixo de dois quadrados
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: to the circle below the two squares

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: quadrado que tem no lado direito um circulo, e o circulo tem no lado direito um triangulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: square that has on its right side a circle, and the circle has on its right side a triangle

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: quadrado na frente do triangulo pequeno, e o triangulo esta na frente da esfera
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: square in front of the small triangle, and the triangle is in front of the sphere
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-cube in-front-of-w landmark-type-cone landmark-size-small landmark-in-front-of-v second-landmark-type-ball

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: circulo vermelho que tem um quadrado do lado esquerdo, e o quadrado tem um triangulo do lado esquerdo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: red circle, which has a square on its left side, and the square has a triangle on its left side
ATTRIBUTE-SET.ANNOTATION: type-ball colour-red right-u landmark-type-cube landmark-right-i second-landmark-type-cone

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: quadrado que esta do lado do triangulo pequeno
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: square that is beside the small triangle

ATTRIBUTE-SET.STRING: para o quadrado que tem ao lado um triangulo e do lado do triangulo um circulo
ATTRIBUTE-SET.TRANSLATION: to the square that has a triangle by its side and beside the triangle a circle
